titleStmt.title: Primitiæ synagogæ. A sermon preached at Ipswich, April 26. 1700. At the opening of a new-erected meeting-house. By John Fairfax, A.M. minister of the Gospel to the congregation there assembling.
titleStmt.author: Fairfax, John, 1623-1700.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Tho. Parkhurst in Cheapside, and sold by Henry Truelove at Ipswich,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
